resources.string: WITH RECURSIVE [category_path]([category_id_from], [category_id_to]) AS ( SELECT [category_id_from], [category_id_to] FROM ( SELECT [category].[id] AS [category_id_from], [category].[parent_id] AS [category_id_to] FROM [category] WHERE [category].[id] != ?1 UNION ALL SELECT ?1 AS [category_id_from], ?2 AS [category_id_to] ) AS [category_path_init] UNION ALL SELECT [category_path].[category_id_from] AS [category_id_from], [category].[parent_id] AS [category_id_to] FROM [category_path] INNER JOIN [category] ON [category].[id] = [category_path].[category_id_to] WHERE [category_path].[category_id_from] != [category_path].[category_id_to] ) SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [category_path] WHERE [category_path].[category_id_from] = [category_path].[category_id_to]);
